loginOptionScreen.termsAndCondition: By singing up, you agree to our Terms. See how we use use your data in our Privacy Policy. We never post on Facebook.

mobileNumberScreen.protectCommunity: We protect our community by making sure everyone on Happy is real.
mobileNumberScreen.weNeverShareWithAnyone: We never share this with anyone and it won't be on your profile

otpScreen.enterCodeSent: Enter the code we've sent by text to {{number}}.

privacyPolicyScreen.infoFromDevice: Along with our partners we store and process info from your device to provide feature in the app and improve marketing campaigns.
privacyPolicyScreen.changePrivacySetting: You can always make changes or opt out in your privacy settings. Find out more in our privacy policy

userInfoWalkthrough.wontAbleToChangeLater: You won't be able to change this later.
userInfoWalkthrough.shownOnProfile: This will be shown on your profile.
userInfoWalkthrough.2PhotoBetterThan1: 2 photos are better than 1, it's dating science. You can change these later.
userInfoWalkthrough.showAgeToPotentialMatches: We show your age to potential matches, not your birthday.
userInfoWalkthrough.pickBestGender: Pick which best describe you. Then add more about your gender.
userInfoWalkthrough.updateThisLater: You can always update this later. We got you.
userInfoWalkthrough.whoWouldYouLikeToDate: Who Would you like to date ?
userInfoWalkthrough.chooseMoreThanOneAnswer: You can choose more than one answer and and change any time.
userInfoWalkthrough.hopingToFind: What are you hoping to find?
userInfoWalkthrough.honestyHelpsYourAndEveryone: Honesty helps you and everyone on Happy to find what you are looking for.
userInfoWalkthrough.shownOnProfileUnlessUnsure: This will be shown on your profile unless you're unsure
userInfoWalkthrough.pick5ThingsYouLove: Pick up to 5 things you love.It'll help you match with people who love them too.
